post_detail.description:
Background:

CFM worked with Vice and Air to create a photo contest Facebook app. Users could upload their photos directly through the app or by using the #airparties hashtag on Twitter, Flickr and Instagram. The app was part of an integrated campaign to launch Air, a vodka drink, through a series of West Coast summer dance parties. The winner of the contest receives an all-expense paid trip to Airâ€™s big West Coast dance party finale in San Francisco.
post_detail.title: VICE Air Facebook App
